alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 9:09PM CDT until May 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lake Palo Pinto, or 17 miles southwest of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Palo Pinto around 925 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
